Name: Don't waste your money
Review_Description__c:
After usage of 1 year .Cooling stopped .on visit of tecnician it was reported that multiple leakage in condenser coil. So it can be assumed  are using sub standard material . As Ac should be durable . customer is not going to chang ac after 1 year only. It is expected that it should last atlest 5-7 years with moderate usage.My ac was used only at night as mostly m in office in day and then also it shows defect just after guarantee expiry.and they are producing bill of 10k for repair of it
Highly not recommended. If you want to buy new ac every year you can go for Voltas.Highly disappointed .

Name: Very Good
Review_Description__c:
Writing review after 10 days of use.


This AC is enough to cool 200sqft easily and efficiently but if you have bigger space go for 2ton AC. Power saving is good enough to notice. Here are pros and cons -

Pros -

â€¢ It uses very less energy, 10 hours of continuous use @24Â°C will only cost 7-8 units.

â€¢ Cooling is very effective and if your room is below 200sqft area, it will cool it in less than 15mins.

â€¢ Design looks good and Filter is easy to clean.

â€¢ Indoor unit makes no noise at all. Outdoor unit makes little higher noise.

â€¢ Himalaya Cool (HC) option cools down room in just 5min. Which is very good feature.



Cons -

â€¢ Energy Control options (80%, 60%, 40%) even though save energy but they do very slow Cooling.

â€¢ Remote sometimes don't changes the settings if you haven't aimed towards AC properly.

â€¢ LG Service guys were not trained properly, they will be in hurry and they will try to do installation asap, in which sometimes they can harm your device (there are literally hundreds of review with this point and now I know why).

â€¢ AC makes noise for every single change you make, which is very irritating if everyone else is sleeping and you decrease temperature at night.

Name: Good choice
Review_Description__c:
Product is good and timely delivered, i have ordered this on 28 May 2020 and got delivered on 30 May. Packing was good although the indoor unit have the manufacturing date of January 2020 and outdoor unit label has of November 2019 means manufacturing is recent of my product.

Pros:-
1.) Plastic used in indoor unit is of high quality.
2.) Copper pipe used in both indoor and outdoor unit with both ocean black protection which increase the life span of ac.
3.) Air flow is high enough can go up to 8-10 meters easily in H cool mode
4.) Air filter is on top so no need to open the front flap for cleaning.
5.) Energy savings mode, you can adjust that according to people in room, idly i use in 60% at 26'C for 3 people in room.

Cons:-
1.) Its a myth that it will consume only 2-3 units in 8 hours of usage. It will consume around 6- 7 units if used in power saving mode.
2.) Remote doesn't have back-lid hard to use in night time and you have to aim properly otherwise it wont work sometime.
3.)  Indoor unit is silent but outdoor make noise.(not much )
4.)Installation is costly 

Overall m very satisfied with product and my purchase experience with flip kart its my 4th appliance with flip kart.

Name: Super!
Review_Description__c:
Here is my review after 5  days experience
Pros:
1. It cools the Room less than 5 minutes if the room size is in b/w (110-150 Sqft).
2. This LG dual inverter comes with another option to cool the room quickly ie., 'High Cool' option. It cools the room in less than 2 min. This feature is very useful if you came from heavy sun & tiered.
3. Less Noise. Its noise around 30 dB
4. No need of stabilizer.
5. It brings new look to your room as it has sleek design.
6. We can control the energy savings through "Energy control" option. It reduces the power consumption.

Cons:

1. Time setting is not very clear. Only educated people can handle this option.To my knowlede it should be easily understandable by everyone.
2. When ever we use any button in remote, the beep sounds from indoor unit is little bit high. It may disturb others sleep.

Name: Mind-blowing purchase
Review_Description__c:
I am in love with the quality that this air conditioner has provided. Trust me LG is best in market. It cools efficiently and is an effective energy saver. 
Don't think too much just purchase it. It's the best.

Name: Excellent
Review_Description__c: After a lot of research, i decided to go with this 1ton 5 star product from LG. The product is perfect for my 132 sqft room, above which is terrace n receives direct sunlight throughout the day....The Design n cooling is fantastic. The packaging n delivery by Flipkart was prompt and excellent. However, the installation team from LG lack expertise to some extent. They didn't have much knowledge of the remote control features. Installation charges - Rs 999/-(inclusive of taxes), Outdoor unit stand(LG brand)- Rs 1000/- + Labour charge for d stand - Rs 200. Total installation costed me Rs 2200/-. Its working fine without stabilizer as of now. My experience says, 1ton is enough for 130 to 140 sqft room if the room is sealed and there's no way for air leakage. So far so good.

Name: Wonderful
Review_Description__c:
I bought this AC on 16th June. I'm happy with the cooling, design of ac is good, service is fine however I didn't like the installation, it could be better. Though its was done on the same day of delivery.
 Features are really good. I recommend to buy this.

Name: Worth every penny
Review_Description__c:
Simply in one word ... LOVED IT . The HyperCool technology of LG is absolutely ðŸ’¯ lit ðŸ”¥ . It cools my 170 sq. Ft room easily in 20 minutes . And the Energy Control mode is absolutely one of the best feature ... your father from now onwards will not beat you for using AC for 10 hours . 
        Blindly buy this AC , Useful when ur mom is angry 
Cools down ur moms anger in 5 minutes ðŸ˜‚

Name: Nice
Review_Description__c:
At the time of installation. Technician arrived as agreed. Specified charge was Rs 750/-. Additional costs as under: 
1. Movement of existing bracket ( needlessly) : 500 
2. Tape for taping the connecting the pipe: 200 
3. Cost of but, bolt and screw: Rs 300 ( false as they used old items from their bags) 
4. Did not affix hole sleeve or cap as they didn't know what that was. Instead demanded that I provide white cement which I did not have so left me with a broken damaged wall. Stuffed it with thermocol when I pointed it out. 
5. Total cost including chai pani Rs 1600/- which I felt was not justified. 
6. However their work was good and behaviour was satisfactory. 
7. Will update on ac performance after three weeks.

Overall a great product.Go for it.

Pros 90%
1.cooling is verry good for my room 230sqfoot in 15 to 20 min. 
2.less electriciety consumpsion on 26 degree.
3.4 in 1 coolling ie, convertable to lesser ton capieciety according to needs. 
4.low noise level indoor and outdoor. 
5.bilt qualiety best in class. 
6.warrenty 1year on product condencer coil. 5 years on circuit. 10 years on compressor which is good. 
7.energy efficiency. Conditions apply.. 
Cons. 10%
1.no night glow buttons on remort. 
2.air flow flif not opens on 90 degree 
Overall the product is good enough for use...

Person who came for installation were very polite and supportive. Even during this critical lockdown time, people from Voltas took proper follow-ups untill the AC got installed.
Worth buying it. Thankyou flipkart ! Thankyou Voltas !

Name: Delightful
Review_Description__c:
I am dividing this review in 2 parts
1) Delivery and installation
So the delivery was quick and installation was also done in 2 days. Only problem I faced was installation charges which was around 2400rs in my case. Also the bluestar installation team doesn't have any coordination between them, basically you will get multiple calls from different bluestar installation guys in your area. Overall the installation although on pricier side went well.

2) AC
The cooling is more than enough for my room. It cools my room within a span of 10-15 mins depending upon the outdoor temperature.
Also the operation is silent compared to my other voltas ac
Remote is pretty good and AC has the required features in this budget
One thing which is missing is horizontal swing also the outlet pipe for water seems pretty weak and fragile compared to my other voltas AC

3 - design is premium
4 - installed by blue star company but outer wall stand is very price high.. This guy charge me 800 for stand. This is to much.. Better to buy online any wall stand.. Almost all installment price is 2500
5- eco mode is used by upper 24'c
6- value for money
Just go for is becoz blue star is blue star..

Name: Expected a better product
Review_Description__c:
Please go for 5 star and 1.5 ton minimum. This AC behaves completely weird. If you put in Auto mode it doesn't cool and if set it to cool mode, it starts cooling but your nostrils will burn. One day we were trying different options and set "I feel" mode. People in the room started feeling dizzy. Skin burning sensation is also there. I don't know why it feels so with this one. And finally power consumption is way too high. Inverter ACs are supposed to be less consuming but this gave a very high bill.

Please don't buy this AC. Go for 5 star one.

Name: Worth the money
Review_Description__c:
This was first AC purchase and I was expecting a complete product with installation. But to my surprise the product was complete in all respects (Blue Star should take this as feedback).

Missing items-
1. 15 Amp Power Plug
2. 2 AAA batteries for remote 
3. AC Stand
4. Water drainage Pipe length is too short (just 1.5 feet) 
5. The length of pipe to external machine is just 9 feet it barely fits. Although I was lucky, Thanks to service man. 

I am not sure why these minor items were NOT part of package and customer has to buy it additionally at comparatively higher price from Installation agency. 

Additional Suggestions- 
1. Blue star installation charges are high (1800) as compared to other companies (1200). 
2. On top of that missing items were charged separately. 

I am from Pune and for me installation was done by "Air-x" agency and I am happy with installation and workmanship. 

Product Choice:-
1. Think of your usages, I am in Pune and going to use this product for 2 months max hence I went ahead with higher power consumption, low noise and low cost with 3 start rating. I saved money initially.

2. While choosing the product, consideration should be
- Power Consumption
- Coil material (Copper)
- Inverter
- Cooling Capacity
- Noise level
- Protection of Machine from Voltage Fluctuations and weather conditions (blue fin)
- Swing type (2 way/ 4 way) 

Don't go for very fancy products with so many Feature, just look for what you need. No one buys AC at MRP there always a discount of 20k whether you buy it online or at store just visit at right time.
